targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  total_accrued
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  cold_water_diff,
  hot_water_diff
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    se.title,
    se.value
FROM invoices AS i
         JOIN invoices_services_extra AS se ON se.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
  AND $__timeFilter(i.date_invoice)
ORDER BY i.date_invoice

SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    s.title,
    s.volume
FROM invoices AS i
    JOIN invoices_services AS s ON s.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
  AND (s.unit IS NULL OR s.unit != "м.кв.")
  AND $__timeFilter(i.date_invoice)
ORDER BY i.date_invoice

SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    s.title,
    s.total
FROM invoices AS i
    JOIN invoices_services AS s ON s.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
  AND $__timeFilter(i.date_invoice)
ORDER BY i.date_invoice

SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    s.title,
    s.rate
FROM invoices AS i
         JOIN invoices_services AS s ON s.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
ORDER BY i.date_invoice;

SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    s.title,
    s.volume - COALESCE((SELECT s2.volume
              FROM invoices AS i2
                  LEFT JOIN invoices_services AS s2 ON s2.invoice_id = i2.id
              WHERE i.address = i2.address
                AND s.title = s2.title
                AND i.date_invoice > i2.date_invoice
                AND i.id != i2.id
              ORDER BY i2.date_invoice DESC
              LIMIT 1), 0) AS volume
FROM invoices AS i
         JOIN invoices_services AS s ON s.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
  AND (s.unit IS NULL OR s.unit != "м.кв.")
ORDER BY i.date_invoice;

panels.title: Повышения и понижения расходов по услугам

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    s.title,
    s.total - COALESCE((SELECT s2.total
              FROM invoices AS i2
                  LEFT JOIN invoices_services AS s2 ON s2.invoice_id = i2.id
              WHERE i.address = i2.address
                AND s.title = s2.title
                AND i.date_invoice > i2.date_invoice
                AND i.id != i2.id
              ORDER BY i2.date_invoice DESC
              LIMIT 1), 0) AS total
FROM invoices AS i
         JOIN invoices_services AS s ON s.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
ORDER BY i.date_invoice;

SELECT
    i.date_invoice AS "time",
    s.title,
    s.rate - COALESCE((SELECT s2.rate
              FROM invoices AS i2
                  LEFT JOIN invoices_services AS s2 ON s2.invoice_id = i2.id
              WHERE i.address = i2.address
                AND s.title = s2.title
                AND i.date_invoice > i2.date_invoice
                AND i.id != i2.id
              ORDER BY i2.date_invoice DESC
              LIMIT 1), 0) AS rate
FROM invoices AS i
         JOIN invoices_services AS s ON s.invoice_id = i.id
WHERE i.address = "$address"
ORDER BY i.date_invoice;

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  house_people
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  house_cold_water_count,
  house_hot_water_count
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  house_energy_lift,
  house_energy
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  house_people_energy
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  house_hot_water_cal
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice

SELECT
  date_invoice AS "time",
  house_square,
  house_sub_square
FROM invoices
WHERE address = "$address"
 AND  $__timeFilter(date_invoice)
ORDER BY date_invoice
